title: Plate, "Wooden Church", 1919
markings: Marks: On backside: Imperial Porcelain Factory mark obscured by green enameled lozenge; hammer, sickle, cog, 1919 hand-painted in blue overglaze; painter's mark (unidentified) hand-painted in green overglaze.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular plate with image of wooden church painted at center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Wooden Church", 1919.
1919. porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-4.
